description: Lint rules for AG-Grid React component library

componentAccess.description: AG-Grid React exports components as properties on the global AgGridReact object

AgGridReact.description: The main grid component is accessed as AgGridReact.AgGridReact, not directly as AgGridReact

rules.description: Validates correct access pattern for AG-Grid React components
rules.message: AG-Grid React component must be accessed as AgGridReact.AgGridReact
rules.errorMessage:
Invalid AG-Grid React component usage. The component is exported as a property on the AgGridReact global object.

Incorrect: React.createElement(AgGridReact, ...)
Correct: React.createElement(AgGridReact.AgGridReact, ...)

This is because the UMD bundle exports the component as window.AgGridReact.AgGridReact, not directly as window.AgGridReact.

rules.description: Suggests using JSX syntax instead of React.createElement for better readability
rules.message: Consider using JSX syntax for AG-Grid React components
rules.errorMessage:
Consider using JSX syntax for better readability.

Current: React.createElement(AgGridReact.AgGridReact, {...})
Suggested: <AgGridReact.AgGridReact {...} />

checkComponentAccess.description: Ensures AG-Grid React components are accessed with the correct namespace pattern

dependencies.ag-grid-community: Required base library for AG-Grid functionality
